version_description:
- Fixed a bug where downloading a movie sometimes lead to uneccesary disk space usage
- Fixed a display bug while sorting the playlist

*****

Movie Player 2已在App Store上架！全新重写，针对iOS 7优化，拥有漂亮的UI和改进的性能，还有许多新功能！ 立即获取！

- Fixed a bug where downloading a movie sometimes lead to uneccesary disk space usage
- Fixed a display bug while sorting the playlist

*****

Movie Player 2已在App Store上架！全新重写，针对iOS 7优化，拥有漂亮的UI和改进的性能，还有许多新功能！ 立即获取！

- iOS 9 support
- Native iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus support
- New design
- Miscellaneous bugfixes

推出Movie Player for macOS

iPhone和iPad上受欢迎的Movie Player现已推出Mac版!
去看看 movie-player.net/zh
